T02D2907:297b-1: badzra bi d'a ra na mandal bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D2907:297b-3: rdo rje rnam par 'joms ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D2907:297b-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2907:297b-5: rdo rje kun dge 'joms mdzad pa'i //
T02D2907:297b-6: dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya //
T02D2907:297b-7: dang por bdag stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D2907:297b-8: aom sho dan te sho dan ye sv'a h'a //
T02D2907:297b-9: zhes dbang po'i sgo dag pa'i khrus byas te /
T02D2907:297b-10: chos thams cad stong pa nid nang gi bdag nyid can gyi khrus byas la /
T02D2907:297b-11: bdag nyid skad cig mas ltar bskyed la /
T02D2907:297b-14: gri hn'a pa ya gri h'um a'a na ya ho: bha ga b'an bidy'a r'a dz'a ya h'um phat /
T02D2907:297b-15: mi 'gro ba rnams la mtshon cha'i char dbab pa ste /
T02D2907:297b-17: h'um bh'um t'am bh'um hr'i: bh'um /
T02D2907:297b-19: de nas mtshon cha lnga'i gur dang sa gzhir gyur to //
T02D2907:297b-20: mtshams kyi khang ba'i nang du /
T02D2907:297b-21: tsakra ga tsa la manda la ma ye zhes /
T02D2907:297b-22: tshogs bsags pa rten gyi dkyil 'khor mdun du sbrul la /
T02D2907:297b-23: phyi dang nang gi mchod pas mchod //
T02D2907:297b-24: rdo rje me'i phyag rgyas mchod pa'i rdzas rnam bsregs la /
T02D2907:297b-25: badzra dhva ti dzva la ram h'um zhes pa'o //
T02D2907:297b-26: dam tshig phyag rgyas sprul te /
T02D2907:297b-28: phra bar satk'a ra pra t'i tstsha h'um /
T02D2907:297b-30: pu shpe tra'm a'a lo ke hri': gandhe aa: nee bi dye h'um:/
T02D2907:297b-31: dbul ba las kyi phyag rgyas dbul /
T02D2907:298a-2: khrus kyi dam pa yon chab 'di //
T02D2907:298a-4: 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol //
T02D2907:298a-5: aom ga nas ma ye h'um /
T02D2907:298a-6: dag cing gtsang mar sbyar ba yi //
T02D2907:298a-7: lha rdzas dam pa'i khrus chab 'di //
T02D2907:298a-9: 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol //
T02D2907:298a-10: aom pra ba ra satk'a ra pra t'itstsha ho //
T02D2907:298a-11: h'um nags tshal bcud ni yi gar 'ong /
T02D2907:298a-12: dri mchog rgyas pa'i spos me 'di //
T02D2907:298a-14: dad pas dbul lo bzhes su gsol //
T02D2907:298a-15: aom na ma: badzra bi d'a rana dh'u pa p'u
T02D2907:298a-16: dza me gha sa mu dra spa ra na sa
T02D2907:298a-17: ma ye h'um // chu'am thang las skyes pa yi //
T02D2907:298a-18: kha dog dbyibs legs me tog 'di //
T02D2907:298a-20: dad pas dbul lo bzhes su gsol //
T02D2907:298a-21: aom na ma: badzra bi d'a ra na pushpa /
T02D2907:298a-22: gdon rnams 'joms shing bkra shis pa'i //
T02D2907:298a-23: dge zhing mun sel snang gsal 'di //
T02D2907:298a-25: dad pas dbul lo bzhes su gsol //
T02D2907:298a-27: 'chal pa'i dri ma sel mdzad pa'i //
T02D2907:298a-28: yid bzhin bdud rtsi mtsho ltar bskyil //
T02D2907:298a-30: dad pas dbul lo bzhes su gsol //
T02D2907:298a-32: dag cing gtsang mar sbyar ba yi//
T02D2907:298a-33: lha rdzas dam pa'i zhal zas 'di //
T02D2907:298a-34: bcom ldan ldan rnam 'joms 'khor bcas la //
T02D2907:298a-35: dad pas dbul lo bzhes su gsol //
T02D2907:298a-37: de las gzhan yang mchod pa'i tshogs //
T02D2907:298a-38: rol mo sgra snyan yid 'ong ba /
T02D2907:298a-39: sems can sdug bsngal tshim mdzad pa'i //
T02D2907:298a-40: dus rnams kun du rgyas gyur cig / aom na
T02D2907:298a-41: ma: bi d'a ra na badzra ghande rani p'u dza
T02D2907:298a-42: me gha sa mu dra na sa ma ye h'um
T02D2907:298a-43: / nang gi mchod pa 'bul ba yang /
T02D2907:298a-44: bdun ni rnam dag byang chub sems //
T02D2907:298a-45: bsod nams tshogs chen bsags par bya /
T02D2907:298a-46: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la /
T02D2907:298a-48: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis /
T02D2907:298a-49: bdag dus thams cad du bzhes su gsol lo //
T02D2907:298a-50: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po yi //
T02D2907:298a-51: dge ba'i rtsa ba ci bsags pa //
T02D2907:298a-52: thams cad ma lus bsdus nas ni //
T02D2907:298a-53: dge rtsa byang chub chen po bsdo //
T02D2907:298a-54: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po yi //
T02D2907:298b-0: byang chub tu ni nges @298b mdzad pa'i //
T02D2907:298b-1: byang chub sems ni bla med pa'i //
T02D2907:298b-2: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bar bgyi //
T02D2907:298b-3: dkon mchog bla ma dam pa'i chos //
T02D2907:298b-4: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang //
T02D2907:298b-5: sems bskyed sdom pa lnga rnams ni //
T02D2907:298b-6: rigs lnga'i dam tshig sdom pa bzung //
T02D2907:298b-7: ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi //
T02D2907:298b-8: ma brgal ba ni bsgral bar bgyi //
T02D2907:298b-9: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs phung ste /
T02D2907:298b-10: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D2907:298b-11: des ni bla na med pa sems kyi mchod pa'o //
T02D2907:298b-12: badzra aa nydza li sar sdom pa /
T02D2907:298b-13: badzra bandha trat ces sdig pa dral /
T02D2907:298b-14: badzra a'a be sha aa: aa: zhes ye shes dbab pa brtan pa badzra mushti bam zhes pa /
T02D2907:298b-15: sdig sgrib dral zhing ye shes dbab pa ni //
T02D2907:298b-16: ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa ste /
T02D2907:298b-17: de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa'o //
T02D2907:298b-18: mchod pa lnga yis tshogs gnyis rdzogs //
T02D2907:298b-19: srung 'khor bsdus la nam mkhar gnas /
T02D2907:298b-20: sarba bidy'a badzra zhes brjod pas //
T02D2907:298b-21: rgyu dang mi rgyu thams cad kun //
T02D2907:298b-22: stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya /
T02D2907:298b-23: sems nyid aa yi rang bzhin las //
T02D2907:298b-24: skye ba'i cho 'phrul yam du shar /
T02D2907:298b-25: sngon po gzhu yi dbyibs lta bu //
T02D2907:298b-26: de steng bam las chu chen ni //
T02D2907:298b-27: zlum la dkar po bsil ba ste /
T02D2907:298b-28: sum las sa gzhi ri rab bskyed //
T02D2907:298b-29: bh'um las rin chen gzhal yas khang //
T02D2907:298b-30: gdan gsum ldan pa'i steng dag tu //
T02D2907:298b-31: aa ni h'um du gyur pa las //
T02D2907:298b-32: 'od zer spro bsdus lan gnyis byas //
T02D2907:298b-33: rdo rje rtse lnga padma'i dbus //
T02D2907:298b-34: de las spros dang bsdus pa yis //
T02D2907:298b-35: spho ta badzra'i sngags brjod pas //
T02D2907:298b-37: sngon po spug gi kha dog la //
T02D2907:298b-38: g-yas pa rgya gram 'dzin pa ste //
T02D2907:298b-39: g-yon na sdigs mdzub thugs kar bsgreng /
T02D2907:298b-40: khro las byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan //
T02D2907:298b-41: cha lugs brgyad dang ldan pa la //
T02D2907:298b-42: thugs las h'um bzhi phyogs bzhir chad //
T02D2907:298b-43: gri gug nyi zla'i rtsibs stengs su //
T02D2907:298b-44: 'jigs pa'i khor bo chen po bzhi //
T02D2907:298b-45: ma nor rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskyed //
T02D2907:298b-46: shar du rdo rje gtum po ni //
T02D2907:298b-47: smug nag rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams //
T02D2907:298b-48: lho ru rdo rje phur bu ni//
T02D2907:298b-49: ljang nag rdo rje phur pa bsnams //
T02D2907:298b-50: nub tu rdo rje be con ni //
T02D2907:298b-51: dmar nag phyag na be con bsnams//
T02D2907:298b-52: byang du rdo rje thob ni //
T02D2907:298b-53: ljang nag phyag na tho ba bsnams //
T02D2907:298b-54: g-yon pa kun ni sdigs mdzub ste //
T02D2907:298b-55: khro las byang chub sems dpa' brgyan //
T02D2907:298b-56: 'khor lo'i gong ras bzhi la ni //
T02D2907:299a-2: padma sna tshogs rdo rje las /
T02D2907:299a-3: sphot badzra badzra s'a sye h'um zhes brjod bas /
T02D2907:299a-4: l'a sye dkar mo phyag na me long bsnams //
T02D2907:299a-6: m'a le sngon mo phyag na phreng ba bsnams //
T02D2907:299a-7: badzra g'i rti hr'i: g'i rti dmar mo phyag na pi wang bsnams //
T02D2907:299a-8: badzra nri tye aa:nri tye aa:ljang gu gar bsgyur thal sbyar spyi //
T02D2907:299a-9: phyi rim rgyas ba'i gru chad la //
T02D2907:299a-10: phyag rgya gser dngul zang lcags gzhong pa bzhi //
T02D2907:299a-11: mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi po bskyed //
T02D2907:299a-12: dh'a pe dkar mo spos gzhong ser mo bshams /
T02D2907:299a-14: pushpe ser mo me tog gzhong pa bsnams //
T02D2907:299a-15: badzra pu shpe tr'am mar me dmar skya me gzhong dmar po bsnams //
T02D2907:299a-16: badzra a'a lo ke hr'i: dri chab ljang gu lcags kyi gzhong pa bsnams //
T02D2907:299a-17: badzra gandhe aa: khyams la phyogs skyong bcu po bskyed //
T02D2907:299a-18: rdo rje thab gru gsum dang //
T02D2907:299a-19: be con ral gri sbrul zhags dang //
T02D2907:299a-20: ba dan dbyug pa kha nv'am ga / shar du nyi zla nub tu bum pa las //
T02D2907:299a-21: sngags 'di brjod la sku ru gsal bar bskyed //
T02D2907:299a-23: brgya byin dkar po phyag na rdo rje bsnams //
T02D2907:299a-25: aa gne dmar ser phyag na me thab bsnams //
T02D2907:299a-27: gshin rje nag po phyag na be con bsnams //
T02D2907:299a-29: bden bral dmar ser phyag na ral gri bsnams //
T02D2907:299a-31: chu lha dmar po phyag na sbrul zhags bsnams //
T02D2907:299a-33: rlung lha dmar ljang phag na ba dan bsnams //
T02D2907:299a-34: ku ba ra ya sv'a h'a //
T02D2907:299a-35: gnod sbyin ljang gu phyag na dbyug to thogs /
T02D2907:299a-36: ai shva na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2907:299a-37: dbang ldan ljang skya phyag na kha tv'am ga //
T02D2907:299a-39: tshangs pa sngo skya phyag na nyi zla bsnams //
T02D2907:299a-40: pra ti bhya ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2907:299a-41: sa bdag mthing nag phyag na bum pa bsnams //
T02D2907:299a-42: dregs pa sems can kun gyi gdan la bzhugs //
T02D2907:299a-43: sgo bzhir phyag rgya lcags kyu dang //
T02D2907:299a-44: zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu las //
T02D2907:299a-45: shar du yang ku sha dza:/
T02D2907:299a-46: rta gdong dkar mo phyag na lcags kyu bsnams //
T02D2907:299a-48: phag gdong nag mo mche zhags thogs pa'o //
T02D2907:299a-49: nub sgor spo ta bam las //
T02D2907:299a-50: nyi zla dmar mo lcags sgrog bsnams par bsgom mo //
T02D2907:299a-51: byang sgor a'a be sha aa: las /
T02D2907:299a-52: thal byed ljang nag dril bu 'khrol bar bskyed do //
T02D2907:299a-53: yang na khyams su bkra shis kyi lha mo brgyad
T02D2907:299b-0: @299b phyag mtshan brgyad las sku mdog ser mo phyag
T02D2907:299b-1: na bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad bsnams pa bskyed do
T02D2907:299b-12: dang po rdo rje ra ba la phyogs skyong bskyed //
T02D2907:299b-13: padma la lha srin sde brgyad bskyed /
T02D2907:299b-14: me 'od la bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu bskyed do //
T02D2907:299b-17: bskyed pa'i lha nyi shu rtsa lnga /
T02D2907:299b-18: mchod pa'i lha stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa lnga'o //
T02D2907:299b-19: rtsa ba'i sngags brjod la phyag rgya bstan //
T02D2907:299b-20: snying po ti lnga dbu stengs su //
T02D2907:299b-21: sangs rgyas lnga yis dbang bskur ba //
T02D2907:299b-22: ka ta badzra zhes brjod pas //
T02D2907:299b-23: spyi bor dbang bskur byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2907:299b-24: bskyed pa'i lha rnams ku la ni //
T02D2907:299b-25: rigs kyi bdag po re re bsgom //
T02D2907:299b-26: dbang bskur lha rnams tham cad la /
T02D2907:299b-27: ma ta badzra zhes brjod pa //
T02D2907:299b-28: lus la rdo rje gos gyon no //
T02D2907:299b-29: ma tha mi 'gyur ka nan btang//
T02D2907:299b-30: aa tha zhes ni bgegs kyang bskrad //
T02D2907:299b-31: su las rdo rje khang pa ni //
T02D2907:299b-32: rab tu brtan par 'gyur ba dang //
T02D2907:299b-33: gzhi yi rnam 'byor lus rnams ni //
T02D2907:299b-34: badzra bdun gyis byin gyis brlab //
T02D2907:299b-35: rang bzhin gnas nas bskul ba ni //
T02D2907:299b-36: ha ra ha ra badzra bi d'a ra /
T02D2907:299b-37: se gol drag tu brdabs pa yi //
T02D2907:299b-38: dza:yi sprul pas snyan gsan dbab //
T02D2907:299b-39: bra ha ra bra ha ra badzra pra bha nydza dza:h'um bam ho:/
T02D2907:299b-40: 'od zer lnga yi mdun du byon //
T02D2907:299b-42: de yis lha rnams cha gnyis dbye /
T02D2907:299b-44: gdan gcig mi gnyis tshul du gcod /
T02D2907:299b-46: de rnams gnyis med 'dres par bstim //
T02D2907:299b-48: aa bra ti ha ta badzra gsung brtan //
T02D2907:299b-49: aa mo gha badzra thugs brtan //
T02D2907:299b-50: ae hye hi badzra dgyes pa bskyed /
T02D2907:299b-51: sh'i gh'am badzra dngos grub ma thob par du bzhugs //
T02D2907:299b-52: dam tshig lha dang ye shes lha //
T02D2907:299b-53: gnyis med bsgrubs la mchod pas mchod //
T02D2907:299b-54: bsgom zhing bzlas pas bsgrub par bya //
T02D2907:299b-55: sngags rings nye ba'i snying po gnyis //
T02D2907:299b-56: bsdus rgyas lha yi bsnyen pa bskyal //
T02D2907:299b-57: mtshan ma dus dang grangs la sogs //
T02D2907:299b-58: dam du bcas pa'i bsnyen pa ni //
T02D2907:299b-59: thun bzhi rim gyis nyin dang mtshan //
T02D2907:299b-60: bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i cho ga bya /
T02D2907:299b-61: dkyil 'khor zhag gi cho ga la /
T02D2907:299b-62: sa dang sta gon rdul tshon rnams //
T02D2907:299b-63: mkhas pas rim par brtsam par bya //
T02D2907:300a-0: @300a * // dang pos yi cho ga ni //
T02D2907:300a-1: sa brtag bslang zhing sbyang ba dang //
T02D2907:300a-2: byin gyis brlab cing gzung ba lnga //
T02D2907:300a-3: sa brtag pa la bzhi ru grangs /
T02D2907:300a-4: rnam mkha'i phyos dang sa gzhi dang /
T02D2907:300a-5: bdag po yod med brtag pa bzhi //
T02D2907:300a-6: sa sbyangs pa la gnyis yin te /
T02D2907:300a-7: mngon pa mi la nyo bslang dang //
T02D2907:300a-8: mi mngon bgegs la bslang ba'o //
T02D2907:300a-9: bden pa bdar te chos bshad bslang ba dang /
T02D2907:300a-10: mchod cing gsol ba gdab ste bslang ba'o //
T02D2907:300a-11: skyob ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /
T02D2907:300a-12: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi //
T02D2907:300a-13: sa dang pha rol phyin pa yi //
T02D2907:300a-14: lha mo khod ni dbang du gyur //
T02D2907:300a-15: ji ltar sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02D2907:300a-16: bdud sde dpung bcas bcom pa bzhin //
T02D2907:300a-17: de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni //
T02D2907:300a-18: rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2907:300a-19: zhes rdo rje brdabs pas sa'i ser ka nas /
T02D2907:300a-20: sa'i lha mo byon te sa gnang ngo //
T02D2907:300a-21: sa'i lha mo dang sa bdag gnas kyi bdag po la mchod pa dang gtor mas mchod nas /
T02D2907:300a-22: h'um gang yang sa la gnas pa dang //
T02D2907:300a-23: sa la rgyu ba'i lha klu rnams /
T02D2907:300a-24: mchod dang gtor ma 'di long la //
T02D2907:300a-25: sems can kun la dge don du /
T02D2907:300a-26: byams pa'i sems kyis gnang bar mdzod //
T02D2907:300a-27: bra ti bya dh'u pam pu sham /
T02D2907:300a-28: a'a lo ke gandhe nee bi dye p'u dz ma
T02D2907:300a-29: gha sa mu dras par na sa ma ye h'um
T02D2907:300a-30: / pra ti bya nam sarba ta th'a ga te
T02D2907:300a-31: bhyo bi shva mukhey bhya:sarba ta tkham aut kham ba
T02D2907:300a-34: las dang bya bas sbyang ba dang //
T02D2907:300a-35: sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang ba'o //
T02D2907:300a-36: chos nyid stong pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas stong bar sbyang ba'o //
T02D2907:300a-37: las dang bya bas brkos te ro lnga bsal //
T02D2907:300a-38: 'thas shing tshad dang ldan par bya //
T02D2907:300a-39: tshangs thig zur thig pa bzhi gdab //
T02D2907:300a-40: cha chen bcu drug bgo byas la /
T02D2907:300a-41: lha snam min pa bzhi bzhir bgo //
T02D2907:300a-42: zlum skar rim pa brgyad du bskor //
T02D2907:300a-43: pho brang 'khor lo'i gong ras la //
T02D2907:300a-44: rim pa gnyis gnyis gzhi ru bskor //
T02D2907:300a-46: cha bran gnyis gnyis mnyam po ru //
T02D2907:300a-47: rim pa bzhin du bskor te gzhag / thing ka dkar po ser le brgan //
T02D2907:300a-48: ljang gu la sogs panytsa btang //
T02D2907:300a-49: yang na mthing ga dkar po dang //
T02D2907:300a-50: dmar po sku gsum tri r'ag //
T02D2907:300a-51: gong ras ljang gu gru chad ser //
T02D2907:300a-52: sgo dang lha snam phyogs tshon la //
T02D2907:300a-53: lnga rtse dmar po pha gu ser //
T02D2907:300b-0: dra ba dkar la @300b chun 'phyang lcags //
T02D2907:300b-1: dkyil 'khor steng du sku gzugs bzhag / sa des
T02D2907:300b-2: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs kyis gzung
T02D2907:300b-3: ba'o / bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i bum pa gzhag pa ni //
T02D2907:300b-4: khro bo las thams cad pas sa gzung ba'o //
T02D2907:300b-5: gnyis pa sta gon gnas par bya //
T02D2907:300b-6: lha dang bum pa slob ma dang //
T02D2907:300b-7: sta gon dus kyi sbyin sreg go //
T02D2907:300b-8: dkyil 'khor lha yi gnas rnams su //
T02D2907:300b-9: tsandan gur gum dir yi thig le bya //
T02D2907:300b-10: rang rang sngags kyis skad cig bskyed //
T02D2907:300b-11: de las mchod dang gtor ma dang /
T02D2907:300b-12: gsang ba sder bzangs mchod pa dbul //
T02D2907:300b-13: mchod de gsol ba gdab pa ni /
T02D2907:300b-14: bcom ldan rdo rje rnam 'joms ni //
T02D2907:300b-15: rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2907:300b-16: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa dang //
T02D2907:300b-17: sems can kun la brtse don du //
T02D2907:300b-19: yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni //
T02D2907:300b-20: tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2907:300b-21: byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol //
T02D2907:300b-22: zhes pa lan gsum du gsol ba gdab po //
T02D2907:300b-23: bum pa sta gon du gnas pa ni /
T02D2907:300b-24: bum pa'i rgyu bstan pa dang /
T02D2907:300b-25: bum pa'i bcud bstan pa dang /
T02D2907:300b-28: bca' ba'i thabs bstan pa dang /
T02D2907:300b-29: bzlas pa'i grangs bstan pa dang /
T02D2907:300b-32: bum pa'i grangs ni bsdus pa drug ste /
T02D2907:300b-33: dbang bskur ba'i bum pa lnga /
T02D2907:300b-34: bud rtsi 'khyil ba'i bum pa dang drug go //
T02D2907:300b-35: rigs kyi mtshan ma ni gur gum gyis ti lnga bri //
T02D2907:300b-36: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la h'um bri //
T02D2907:300b-37: kha dog mthing ser dmar ljang ngo //
T02D2907:300b-38: bdud rtsi spug gi kha dog can du bya'o //
T02D2907:300b-39: bam las bum pa gzhal yas khang //
T02D2907:300b-40: bam las bdud rtsi'i gzhal yas bskyed //
T02D2907:300b-41: rgya mtsho padma'i gang na stengs su //
T02D2907:300b-42: ti dang ya yig h'um las ni //
T02D2907:300b-43: lha bskyed spyan drangs mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2907:300b-44: nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa ni //
T02D2907:300b-45: bum pa re la rdzogs par bya //
T02D2907:300b-46: yungs kar re la sngags re btab //
T02D2907:300b-47: des ni bum pa'i sta gon no //
T02D2907:300b-48: de nas slob ma lha par gnas pa ni //
T02D2907:300b-49: de la dang po khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon zhing /
T02D2907:300b-50: lag na me tog thogs la /
T02D2907:300b-51: slob dpon lha la phyag byas la 'di skad zhu'o //
T02D2907:300b-52: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pas //
T02D2907:301a-0: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su @301a * //
T02D2907:301a-2: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D2907:301a-3: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D2907:301a-4: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02D2907:301a-5: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2907:301a-6: skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol //
T02D2907:301a-7: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02D2907:301a-8: mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyi //
T02D2907:301a-9: de nas slob dpon gyis spro ba bskyed la /
T02D2907:301a-10: ho rtog pa rnams ni legs par bsdus nas su //
T02D2907:301a-11: shin tu bsam pa bzang dang ldan pas nyon /
T02D2907:301a-12: brjed ngas blo la rdo rje rnam 'joms pa'i //
T02D2907:301a-13: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob //
T02D2907:301a-14: de nas slob mas sdig pa bshags pa /
T02D2907:301a-15: dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang //
T02D2907:301a-16: rjes su yi rang yang na bgyid stsal gang //
T02D2907:301a-17: de dag thams cad byang chub mchog chen gyi //
T02D2907:301a-18: spyan sngar sdig pa ma lus so sor bshags //
T02D2907:301a-19: zhes lan gsum du brjod do //
T02D2907:301a-20: bdag gis sems can don du ni //
T02D2907:301a-21: byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya /
T02D2907:301a-22: sdug bsngal gru las thar pa'i phyir //
T02D2907:301a-23: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do //
T02D2907:301a-24: slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje rgya gram bcug la /
T02D2907:301a-25: na ma: tsanda badzra kro dha k'i li k'i l'a ya /
T02D2907:301a-26: zhes brjod la slob ma rdo rje rnam par bskyed la //
T02D2907:301a-27: h'um hr'am hr'i: aa: zhes pas gnas bzhi byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2907:301a-28: rdo rje bsdams pa'i phyag rgyas snying gar h'um las rdo rje /
T02D2907:301a-29: dpral bar tr'am las rin po che /
T02D2907:301a-31: spyi bor aa: las sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed do //
T02D2907:301a-32: de ltar gnas bzhir ye shes bzhi rtags dang ldan
T02D2907:301a-33: par byin gyis brlabs nas mchod pa dbul zhing snang
T02D2907:301a-34: bar byas te / bdug spos lag tu gtad /
T02D2907:301a-36: dri thugs kar byug / mar me snang par bstan //
T02D2907:301a-37: lha bshos zhal du bcug / sil snyan rna bar bsgrags /
T02D2907:301a-38: sngags dang phyag rgyas tshig rnams go bar brjod do //
T02D2907:301a-39: aa shvattha la sogs pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis
T02D2907:301a-40: pa rtse mo me tog bcings ba de badzra h'a
T02D2907:301a-41: sa ha zhes sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2907:301a-42: ku sha sngon po badzra tri nytsa zhes gtdad la /
T02D2907:301a-43: la la sngas su gzhug la la stan du bting ba la nyol cig bsgo'o //
T02D2907:301a-44: di nas rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas pa'i srung skud mgul du gdags so //
T02D2907:301b-0: nang par bzhin bzangs longs shig / dkyil 'khor @301b chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod do //
T02D2907:301b-1: lha gnas slob ma sta gon gyi cho ga'o //
T02D2907:301b-3: badzra drishti mata ces nam mkha' la bteg la thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2907:301b-4: gzhung dang mthun par bris nas ni //
T02D2907:301b-5: dkyil 'khor nam mkhar bslang bar bya ste //
T02D2907:301b-6: rdo rje rgya gram phyag rgyas /
T02D2907:301b-7: badzra pe ga kra ma h'u zhes gdeg par bya'o //
T02D2907:301b-8: phyag mtshan la sta gon gyi ye shes dbang ste /
T02D2907:301b-15: zhes sgo ba 'bebs pa'i bar du dbab par bya'o //
T02D2907:301b-16: dkyil 'khor byin dang ldan pa'i phyir /
T02D2907:301b-17: rdo rje gzungs kyis bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D2907:301b-18: bdag rdo rje rnam par 'joms par bsgoms la /
T02D2907:301b-19: gzungs tshar nyi shu rtsa gcig bton pas /
T02D2907:301b-20: kun kyang rdo rje'i gur dang sa gzhir gyur te /
T02D2907:301b-21: mtshams bcad cing bar chad med par bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2907:301b-22: lhag chad kyi nyes pa kha bskang bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2907:301b-23: rdo rje shugs kyis bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D2907:301b-24: rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa bzlas shing /
T02D2907:301b-25: dril bu dkrol zhing lan bdun du dkyil 'khor la bskor ba bya'o //
T02D2907:301b-26: rdo rje shugs ni dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bteg te bskor ba byas pas /
T02D2907:301b-27: cho ga lhag pa dang ma tshang ba'i nyes pa dang /
T02D2907:301b-28: ma 'byor ba'i cho ga nyams pa thams cad sor chud par 'gyur ro //
T02D2907:301b-29: rtsa ba'i sngags brjod pa thams cad gsung yin /
T02D2907:301b-30: lha thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gsal ba thugs /
T02D2907:301b-31: de las sku gsal ba dbyer med du gyur par bsgom mo //
T02D2907:301b-32: dkyil 'khor gyi gdan thog tu phyag mtshan phab pa de rnams la /
T02D2907:301b-33: nama:tsanda badzra kro h'a k'i li k'i l'a ya zhes brjod pa gsung /
T02D2907:301b-34: rdo rje rgya gram du gsal pa de thugs /
T02D2907:301b-35: de las 'od zer 'phro 'du byas te skur dkrongs
T02D2907:301b-36: tser song ba de gsum dbyer med pa de dag
T02D2907:301b-37: sku gsung tha mi dad par bsgrub pa'o //
T02D2907:301b-38: dkyil 'khor gyi lha ye shes lha'i bdag nyid can du bsgrub pa'i chos brgyad de /
T02D2907:301b-39: rdo rje slob dpon gyis se gol brngab cing /
T02D2907:301b-40: badzra sa ma ya dza: h'um bam ho: zhes rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drang ngo //
T02D2907:301b-41: badzra gandhe pra be sha phat /
T02D2907:301b-43: badzra aam ku sha dza: phyi nas nang du spyan drang /
T02D2907:302a-2: badzra spho ta bam gnyis med pa stim /
T02D2907:302a-3: a'a be sha aa: zhes dgyes pa bskyed /
T02D2907:302a-4: badzra aa mri ta kunda li sarba bi gha n'am n'a sha ya h'um phat /
T02D2907:302a-6: badzras sandhi bam gyis sgo bcad do //
T02D2907:302a-7: yi ge gnyis kyis lha thams cad la rdo rje ka nan gtang /
T02D2907:302a-8: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab bar bya ste /
T02D2907:302a-9: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas te /
T02D2907:302a-10: aom badzra tsant dri shya dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2907:302a-13: aom bdzra tsanda badzra tsanda ti /
T02D2907:302a-14: rtsa ba'i lha'i snying po mthun te lnga'o //
T02D2907:302a-17: g'i ti hr'i: nri tye aa: aom badzra dh'u pa h'um /
T02D2907:302a-19: a'a lo ke hr'i: gandhe aa: aom badzra siddham /
T02D2907:302a-26: bkra shis lha mo brgyad ni phyag thal mo gzings pa'o //
T02D2907:302a-27: aom badzra aam ku sha dza: aom badzra p'a sha h'um /
T02D2907:302a-28: aom badzra spo ta pam a'a badzra a'a pe sha aa: zhes dam tshig phyag rgya'o //
T02D2907:302a-30: lha thams cad kyi ljags la badzra dharma dzny'a na zhes bsgom mo //
T02D2907:302a-34: g-yon sdigs mdzub thugs ka ra bsgreng ba'o //
T02D2907:302a-36: sems can thams cad bsrung ba'i las mdzad du gsol //
T02D2907:302a-37: rdo rje gtum pos zhi ba'i las mdzad du gsol //
T02D2907:302a-38: rdo rje phur bus rgyas pa'i las mdzad du gsol //
T02D2907:302a-39: rdo rje be con gyis dbang gi las mdzad du gsol //
T02D2907:302a-40: rdo rje tho bas sems can thams cad rengs pa'i las mdzad du gsol //
T02D2907:302a-41: gsang ba'i lha mo bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes pa'i las mdzad du gsol //
T02D2907:302a-42: mchod pa'i lha mo bzhis mchod pa'i las mdzad du gsol /
T02D2907:302a-43: bkra shis lha mo brgyad kyis sems can thams cad re ba bskang ba'i las mdzad du gsol //
T02D2907:302a-44: sgo ba bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa dgug gzhug gi las mdzad du gsol la /
T02D2907:302a-45: phyag rgya chen po rdo rje dril bu thogs la /
T02D2907:302a-46: las kyi phyag rgya bzhin bca' zhing /
T02D2907:302a-47: h'um mu dra ma h'a sa lha thams cad zhi ba'i las mdzad du gsol lo //
T02D2907:302a-48: kun gyi phrin las gcig yin pas //
T02D2907:302a-49: de nas re re ma bshad do //
T02D2907:302b-0: mchod pa rgyas par bar 'dir mchod @302b par bya'o //
T02D2907:302b-1: mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod //
T02D2907:302b-2: bcom ldan khro bo gos sngon can //
T02D2907:302b-3: yon tan thams cad 'dus pa'i sku //
T02D2907:302b-4: rdo rje gram las rnams rdzogs //
T02D2907:302b-5: rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2907:302b-6: bcom ldan rdo rje gtum po ni //
T02D2907:302b-7: mthing nag brjid pa'i cha lugs can //
T02D2907:302b-8: rdo rje rtse lnga sdigs mdzub 'gyed //
T02D2907:302b-9: rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2907:302b-10: bcom ldan rdo rje phur bu ni //
T02D2907:302b-11: ser nag 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can //
T02D2907:302b-12: rdo rje phur bus las rnams mdzad //
T02D2907:302b-13: yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2907:302b-14: bcom ldan rdo rje be con ni //
T02D2907:302b-15: dmar nag 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can /
T02D2907:302b-17: dbang sdud sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2907:302b-18: bcom ldan rdo rje tho ba ni //
T02D2907:302b-19: ljang nag 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can //
T02D2907:302b-20: thod sbrul dar gyi rgyan cha can //
T02D2907:302b-21: phrin las rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2907:302b-22: sge mo phreng ba gar dang dbyangs //
T02D2907:302b-23: mdzes pa'i me long phreng bas brgyan //
T02D2907:302b-24: snyan pa'i pi wang gar sgyur zhing //
T02D2907:302b-25: gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2907:302b-26: bdug pa me tog mar me dri //
T02D2907:302b-27: rin chen mdzes pa'i gzhong pa bsnams //
T02D2907:302b-29: mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2907:302b-30: bkra shis lha mo las kyi sku //
T02D2907:302b-31: btso ma gser mdog rgyas pa'i sku //
T02D2907:302b-32: phyag na bkra shis rdzas brgyad bsnams //
T02D2907:302b-33: re skong rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2907:302b-34: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril //
T02D2907:302b-35: dgug gzhug dgyes pa'i las mdzad ma //
T02D2907:302b-36: sgo ba rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2907:302b-37: tshangs pa brgya byin me yi lha //
T02D2907:302b-38: gshin rje srin po chu yi lha //
T02D2907:302b-39: rlung lha gnod sbyin bgegs kyi rgyal //
T02D2907:302b-40: sa bdag la sogs phyogs skyong bcu //
T02D2907:302b-41: lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang //
T02D2907:302b-42: mkha'i lding 'dab bzangs lus srul po //
T02D2907:302b-44: sde brgyad tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2907:302b-45: sa chu me rlung nam mkha' la //
T02D2907:302b-46: gnas pa'i bgegs rigs stong phrag chos //
T02D2907:302b-48: sa gnas rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2907:302b-49: de nas bsgom zhing bzlas pas bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D2907:302b-50: lha rnams rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02D2907:303a-0: rdo rje'i lte ba'i h'um la rang rang gi sngags @303a * //
T02D2907:303a-1: kyis bskor ba la bzlas pa byas pas /
T02D2907:303a-2: sngags kyis lha mo mchod pa dang /
T02D2907:303a-5: dngos grub bsdu ba'i las bzhi'i 'phro 'du bya'o //
T02D2907:303a-6: de nas thun mtshams su sder bzangs kyi mchod pa dbul te /
T02D2907:303a-7: tshe 'dzin zas kyi steng du ni //
T02D2907:303a-8: sbrang gi seng ge skyong bzhi gzhag //
T02D2907:303a-9: mar gyi tha ma zas kyi bcud //
T02D2907:303a-10: bu ram dpag bsam rdzing gi shing //
T02D2907:303a-11: lan tshva spod mchog gangs ri spungs //
T02D2907:303a-13: bcom ldan rdo rje rnam 'joms la //
T02D2907:303a-14: snying po lnga yi mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2907:303a-15: tshogs bsags byang chub lam sbyang phyir //
T02D2907:303a-16: thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
T02D2907:303a-17: aom a'a: h'um pa na pem pe na ku ra ksha kh'a hi /
T02D2907:303a-18: zhes lan gsum par du btab par bya'o //
T02D2907:303a-19: bcom ldan rdo rje gtum po la //
T02D2907:303a-20: snying po lnga yi mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2907:303a-21: tshogs bsags byang chub lam sbyang phyir //
T02D2907:303a-22: thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
T02D2907:303a-23: aom a'a: h'um pa na pem pen ku ra ksha kh'a hi /

T02D2907:303a-27: thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //

T02D2907:303a-43: aom a'a: h'um pa na pem pen ku ra ksha kh'a hi /
T02D2907:303a-45: gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi po la //
T02D2907:303a-46: snying po lnga yi mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2907:303a-47: tshogs bsags byang chub lam sbyang phyir //
T02D2907:303a-48: thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
T02D2907:303a-49: aom a'a: h'um pa na pem pe na ku ra ksha kh'a hi /
T02D2907:303a-50: rgyas pa'i gru chad ser po la //
T02D2907:303a-51: las mdzad mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi //
T02D2907:303b-0: snying po lnga @303b yi mchod pa 'bul //

T02D2907:303b-2: thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
T02D2907:303b-3: aom a'a: h'um pa na pem pen ku ra ksha kh'a hi /
T02D2907:303b-4: 'bar ba'i bar khyams phyogs mtshams brgyad //
T02D2907:303b-5: yid 'ong bkra shis lha mo brgyad //

T02D2907:303b-7: tshogs bsags byang chub lam sbyang phyir //

T02D2907:303b-17: phyogs skyong sde brgyad 'byung po'i tshogs //
T02D2907:303b-18: snying po lnga yi mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2907:303b-19: tshogs bsags byang chub lam sbyang phyir //
T02D2907:303b-20: thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
T02D2907:303b-21: aom gyis nyes pa'i skyon rnams dag / a'a: yis bdud rtsi chen por gyur //
T02D2907:303b-22: h'um gis spros te mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2907:303b-23: pa na pem pen na ku ra ksha kh'a hi /
T02D2907:303b-24: phud tsho bcu'i mchod pa 'bul lo //
T02D2907:303b-25: de nas nang du 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams la zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis mchod //
T02D2907:303b-26: de nas sgo'i phyi rol 'od kor la /
T02D2907:303b-27: 'jig rten pa rnams gtor ma cha gsum gyis mchod /
T02D2907:303b-28: dkyil 'khor bris pa'i rjes la dkyil 'khor bslang zhing ye shes phab la /
T02D2907:303b-30: rigs kyi bum pa lnga phyogs bzhi dbus dang ldar dgod /
T02D2907:303b-31: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bum pa 'jug pa sgo'i g-yon logs su dgon /
T02D2907:303b-32: de rnams lhar bskyed la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod //
T02D2907:303b-33: bsgom zhing bzlas pa'i skabs su //
T02D2907:303b-34: bum pa re la snying po brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis bskyal lo //
T02D2907:303b-35: dang po dkyil 'khor bslang zhing ye shes dbab pa'i bsgrub pa byas la /
T02D2907:303b-36: bum pa dgram pa sngon du 'gro ba mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod /
T02D2907:303b-37: dkyil 'khor de byin dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2907:303b-38: rdo rje gzungs kyi sgrub pa byas la /
T02D2907:303b-39: lhag chad kyi nyes pa bskang ba rdo rje shugs kyi bsgrub pa bya /
T02D2907:303b-40: sku gsungs thugs tha mi dad pa'i bsgrub pa bya /
T02D2907:304a-0: dkyil 'khor gyi lha ye shes kyi lha'i @304a * //
T02D2907:304a-2: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab ste /
T02D2907:304a-4: rtsa ba'i lha bsgom zhing sgrub pa byas te /
T02D2907:304a-5: sder bzangs tshogs kyi mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2907:304a-6: nang du 'jig rten las 'das pa la sbyin sreg gis mchod //
T02D2907:304a-7: phyi rol du 'jig rten pa la gtor ma cha
T02D2907:304a-8: gsum gyis mchod la de ltar mchod cing bsgrub pa'i
T02D2907:304a-9: chos bcu gcig la gnas nas dbang bskur bar bya
T02D2907:304a-10: ste / de yang dang po la slob ma lhag gnas kyi dus kyi /
T02D2907:304a-11: dbang bskur ba smin pa'i chos bcu po bya /
T02D2907:304a-12: slob ma dang po lus khrus byas la slob dpon la gsol pa gdab //
T02D2907:304a-13: de nas slob dpon gyis spro ba bskyed /
T02D2907:304a-14: slob mas rang gi sdig pa bshags nas sems bskyed //
T02D2907:304a-16: lha'i gnas gzhi byin gyis brlab slon ma'i lus lha'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2907:304a-17: slob dpon gyis de la mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2907:304a-18: lha gang la dbang thob pa'i dkyil 'khor du spyan bkab la so shing bskyur //
T02D2907:304a-19: dbang la bar chad bskyab phyir srung skud gdags so //
T02D2907:304a-20: h'um srung skud sngags kyi byin rlabs kyis //
T02D2907:304a-21: lha yi mgul du dbang bskur bas //
T02D2907:304a-22: cis kyang mi tshugs mi shigs pa'i //
T02D2907:304a-23: rod rje'i dbang mchog thob par shog //
T02D2907:304a-24: aom badzra raksha raksha bsrung du gsol lo //
T02D2907:304a-25: bar chad cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i rdo rje'i go cha gyon par bsam mo //
T02D2907:304a-26: de nas slon dpon ma dkyil 'khor du bcug la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2907:304a-27: dang po bum pa thogs te 'di skad du //
T02D2907:304a-28: bum pa dag byed chos nyid spros bral sku //
T02D2907:304a-29: kun gzhi nyon mongs gnas gyur lus dag ste //
T02D2907:304a-30: me long lta bu'i ye shes mthar rtogs nas //
T02D2907:304a-31: rdo rje rnam 'joms sku ru sangs rgyas shog //
T02D2907:304a-32: nam: tsanda badzra aa bhi shi nytsa h'u /
T02D2907:304a-33: aom h'um h'um h'um: aa: lan lnga brjod pa gong mas 'gre /
T02D2907:304a-34: bum pa chu yi dbang bskur bas //
T02D2907:304a-35: lus kyi sgrib pa dag pa ste //
T02D2907:304a-36: me long lta bu'i don mchog ni //
T02D2907:304a-37: snang la rang bzhin med pa'i don rtogs par gyur cig //
T02D2907:304a-38: de nas dbu rgyan thogs la 'di skad do //
T02D2907:304a-39: dbu rgyan rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi sku //
T02D2907:304a-40: nyon mongs lnga yi gnas ni dag 'gyur te //
T02D2907:304a-41: lus kyi sgrib pa dag ste mnyam nyid rtogs //
T02D2907:304b-0: rin chen 'byung ldan sku ru @304b sangs rgyas shog //
T02D2907:304b-1: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo'i phyag rgya bcas te /
T02D2907:304b-2: aom badzra dhva tv'i shva ri ni h'um /
T02D2907:304b-3: badzra ni aa bhi shi nytsa m'am /
T02D2907:304b-7: aom karma badzra ni h'um aa bhi shi nytsa m'am /
T02D2907:304b-8: rigs kyi bu khyod la dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur bas /
T02D2907:304b-9: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnas gyur pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs te /
T02D2907:304b-10: rin chen 'byung ldan skur sangs rgyas par gyur cig //
T02D2907:304b-11: de nas rdo rje thogs la 'di skad do /
T02D2907:304b-12: h'um sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02D2907:304b-13: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02D2907:304b-14: sangs rgyas kun du rab grub phyir //
T02D2907:304b-15: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
T02D2907:304b-16: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti aa bhi shi nytsa badzra sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2907:304b-17: rigs kyi bu la rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas //
T02D2907:304b-18: yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas gyur cing //
T02D2907:304b-19: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes thob gyur cig //
T02D2907:304b-20: de nas ming gi dbang bskur te /
T02D2907:304b-21: kye rdo rje kun du bzang po zhes ming btags pas /
T02D2907:304b-22: rnam rtog sgo lnga'i dri ma gnas gyur pas /
T02D2907:304b-23: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes der rtogs nas //
T02D2907:304b-24: ye shes rang gnas kyi dbang thob par gyur cig //
T02D2907:304b-25: aom badzra sa tva stvam aa bhi shi nytsa badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02D2907:304b-26: rdo rje ming gi dbang thob pa kho nar gyur cig //
T02D2907:304b-27: de nas rdo rje dril bu gnyis ka thogs la /
T02D2907:304b-28: rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi dbang bskur ba /
T02D2907:304b-30: phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug //
T02D2907:304b-31: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D2907:304b-32: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02D2907:304b-33: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta si ddhi badzras sa
T02D2907:304b-34: ma ya ti shtha ae sha stvam dha ra y'a
T02D2907:304b-35: mi badzras tva hi hi h'um /
T02D2907:304b-36: rigs kyi bu khyod la rod rje brtul zhugs kyi dbang bskar bas /
T02D2907:304b-37: khyad par byang chub sems dang ldan te /
T02D2907:304b-39: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rtogs pa kho nar gyur cig //
T02D2907:304b-40: de las slob ma la bkra shis gsol lo //
T02D2907:304b-42: skar ma rab rib mar me dang //
T02D2907:304b-43: sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang //
T02D2907:304b-44: rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bu //
T02D2907:304b-47: sa ma ya tra ta ces /
T02D2907:304b-48: dbus nas nub tu kha bltas te zhal bsum mo //
T02D2907:304b-49: rim par brtsams pas bdag nyid dga' //
T02D2907:304b-50: shes par byas pas sum la sgron //
T02D2907:305a-2: bdag pas dman la phan phyir brtsams //
T02D2907:305a-3: 'di yis bsod nams gong thob pa //
T02D2907:305a-4: rnam 'joms sku yi zhal mthong shog //
T02D2907:305a-5: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dga' ba'i sgron ma zhes
T02D2907:305a-6: bya ba zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi slob dpon
T02D2907:305a-7: chen po rdo rje go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so
